# textSelections

**Instance Property**

An array of text selections associated by the text layout manager.

## Declaration

```swift
var textSelections: [NSTextSelection] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Each [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextSelection] represents an insertion point. The selection state that the framework shares among all viewports connected to the text layout manager through text containers.

## Accessing the text storage

- **textContentManager**: Returns the text content manager associated with this text layout manager.
- **textContainer**: The text container object that provides geometric information for the layout destination.
- **textSelectionNavigation**: Returns a text selection manager configured to have the text layout manager as its data source.
- **usageBoundsForTextContainer**: Returns the usage bounds for the text container.
- **enumerateTextSegments(in:type:options:using:)**: Enumerates text segments of a specific type and in the text range you provide.
- **replace(_:)**: Replaces the current text content manager with a new one you provide.
- **replaceContents(in:with:)**: Replaces content at the location you specify with an attributed string you provide.
- **replaceContents(in:with:)**: Replaces content at the location you specify with the text elements string you provide.
